body_html: I've noticed that using pip install tensorflow-gpu also installs tensorflow as a dependency, but pip install tensorflow-gpu==1.2.1 does not demonstrate this behavior. Is this an issue with the 1.3 rollout, or am I completely missing something?
body_text: I've noticed that using pip install tensorflow-gpu also installs tensorflow as a dependency, but pip install tensorflow-gpu==1.2.1 does not demonstrate this behavior. Is this an issue with the 1.3 rollout, or am I completely missing something?
body: I've noticed that using `pip install tensorflow-gpu` also installs `tensorflow` as a dependency, but `pip install tensorflow-gpu==1.2.1` does not demonstrate this behavior. Is this an issue with the 1.3 rollout, or am I completely missing something?
